channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple active finalement la traduction en direct pour les AirPods en Europe
item.description: Apple va finalement activer la traduction en temps réel des AirPods dans l'Union européenne. Une fonction lancée partout ailleurs dans le monde depuis iOS 26, mais que le constructeur ne voulait pas lancer sur le vieux continent en raison du règlement sur les marchés numériques (DMA). La nouveauté sera disponible courant décembre avec iOS 26.2.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Is Adding So Many ‘Star Wars’ Guns
item.description: 'Renegades,' the 'Star Wars'-inspired upcoming expansion for Bungie's sci-fi shooter, will bring you plenty of firepower from a galaxy far, far away... and, of course, a certain laser sword.

item.title: Fitbit still has a place in the smartwatch era – just look at the Apple Watch SE 3
item.description: Why testing the Apple Watch SE 3 got me excited for next year's Fitbit release.

item.title: Ever update and shut down your Windows 11 PC, and it restarts instead? Yeah, you're not seeing things – Microsoft confirms it was a bug
item.description: Finally, this annoying bug is gone

item.title: OpenAI launches its Sora app on Android
item.description: OpenAI has brought its AI video app, Sora, to Android. The app, which lets you create, share, and remix AI-generated videos, is now available on the Google Play Store in the US, Canada, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam, according to an announcement on Tuesday. OpenAI launched Sora on iOS in September, with the app […]

item.title: Our Favorite Gaming Headset for Xbox Owners Is Discounted
item.description: Save almost $20 on Microsoft's first-party headset for Xbox Series S/X.

item.title: Samsung previews HDR10 Plus Advanced, its answer to Dolby Vision 2
item.description: During a press junket last week, Samsung showed a simulated demo of the new dynamic HDR format, and it includes six features similar to what the recently-revealed Dolby Vision 2 will offer. TVs from Samsung and any other manufacturers who support it will be able to boost picture brightness for 4,000-5,000 nit TVs that have […]

item.title: The firm behind one of the best business VPNs around is launching a Gen AI tool - here's what it could do for your company
item.description: Proton introduces Lumo for Business, offering enterprise-grade AI with zero-access encryption and open source transparency.

item.title: Sean Duffy Warns Some Airspace Could be Shut Down If Government Doesn’t Reopen
item.description: The current government shutdown will become the longest in U.S. history if it continues into Wednesday.

item.title: It Sure Sounds Like ‘Star Trek 4’ Is Dead (Again)
item.description: A new report claims Paramount has officially moved along from the Chris Pine and Zachary Quinto-led cast.

item.title: Norway’s wealth fund vote is latest blow to Musk’s $1 trillion pay package
item.description: Elon Musk is pushing for a $1 trillion performance pay package. Another major shareholder has said no.

item.title: Every current-gen Fitbit is already heavily discounted for Black Friday
item.description: Black Friday is still nearly a month off, but that hasn’t stopped the big-name retailers — specifically Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy — from discounting a slew of Fitbit devices in the run-up to the main event. Most of the company’s smartwatches and fitness trackers are either matching or exceeding their lowest price to date, and in […]

item.title: Noté 9/10, cet ultrabook HP OLED hybride devient nettement plus intéressant lors du pré-Black Friday après 300 € de remise
item.description: Le HP OmniBook X Flip 14 est un ultrabook 2-en-1 que l'on a testé et largement validé. Ce modèle propulsé par un Intel Core Ultra 7 est actuellement affiché à 999,99 euros au lieu de 1 299,99 euros chez Darty et à la Fnac à l'approche du Black Friday.

item.title: Shopify says AI traffic is up 7x since January, AI-driven orders are up 11x
item.description: Shopify says AI-driven traffic to its online stores is up 7x since January, and orders from AI search are up 11x.

item.title: Incitation au suicide : le parquet de Paris enquête sur les dérives de TikTok auprès des plus jeunes
item.description: TikTok est dans le collimateur du parquet de Paris. Une enquête préliminaire a été ouverte sur le réseau social dont l'algorithme faciliterait l'accès à des contenus susceptibles de pousser les plus jeunes et les plus vulnérables vers le suicide.

item.title: The Fight for NASA Administrator Is Getting Dirty
item.description: Jared Isaacman's radical plans for NASA have suddenly come to light, and sources allege that Acting Administrator Sean Duffy may be behind the leak.

item.title: Netflix in talks to license video podcasts from iHeartMedia, report says
item.description: Netflix is looking for exclusivity, which means that video podcasts that it licenses could no longer be uploaded to YouTube.

item.title: One of the most devious malware strains might have been cracked - and it's all thanks to Gen AI
item.description: Check Point Research experts use ChatGPT to uncover a lot about XLoader.

item.title: Robert Pattinson Confirms He’s in ‘Dune: Part Three’ and Also That the Desert Is Very Hot
item.description: The star confirmed his rumored involvement in the Denis Villeneuve sequel in the most casual way possible.

item.title: How to watch Liverpool vs Real Madrid: Free streams, preview for Champions League 2025/26 game
item.description: All the ways to watch Liverpool vs Real Madrid live streams online and on TV from anywhere as the Reds welcome Galacticos to Anfield.

item.title: Boeing faces its first civil trial for deadly Ethiopia crash
item.description: An eight-person jury would be tasked with deciding how much Boeing should pay to the families of two victims. More than six years after a Boeing 737 Max jetliner crashed in Ethiopia, the first civil trial stemming from the disaster that killed all 157 people on board the plane appears poised to move forward.

item.title: Predator: Badlands is a lighthearted twist on the brutal sci-fi series
item.description: Between Prey and Predator: Killer of Killers, 20th Century Studios' classic survival thriller franchise has been on a tear with stories that get at the heart of what makes this world of alien big game hunters great. In both films, director Dan Trachtenberg stuck to the Predator series' narrative basics and focused on crafting clever […]

item.title: Wikipedia co-founder joins editing conflict over the Gaza genocide page
item.description: Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales has jumped into a conflict over the online encyclopedia’s page on “Gaza genocide.” Just days after a Wikipedia editor froze changes to the article, Wales posted a statement on a page dedicated to discussing edits, saying the article “requires immediate correction” and is part of a broader neutrality problem on the […]...

item.title: I spent a week with the Samsung Galaxy XR and Apple's Vision Pro has nothing to worry about – yet
item.description: Samsung's first mixed-reality headset is a decent first effort, but it fails to impress in a few key areas.

item.title: HDR10+ Advanced vs Dolby Vision 2 : quelle est la meilleure expérience HDR ?
item.description: HDR10+ Advanced et Dolby Vision 2 incarnent la nouvelle génération des technologies HDR, chacune misant sur des métadonnées dynamiques et l’intelligence artificielle pour sublimer la qualité d’image sur les téléviseurs haut de gamme. Notre analyse complète.

item.title: Huawei corrige Apple et Samsung avec smartphone ultrafin équipé d’une énorme batterie et d’un téléobjectif périscopique
item.description: Alors que Samsung revient sur ses pas et qu'Apple essuie de mauvaises ventes sur l'iPhone Air, Huawei s'apprête à lancer le Mate 70 Air, sa propre vision du smartphone fin.

item.title: Nothing has a fix for its Meta bloatware issue, solving a problem that never should’ve existed
item.description: Why was this even a thing?

item.title: Le top 3 des voitures électriques préférées de Survoltés en novembre 2025
item.description: En cette fin d'année, le marché de la voiture électrique reste toujours aussi actif. Notre équipe de journalistes vous livre le top 3 de leurs voitures électriques favorites pour ce mois de novembre.

item.title: Saudi oil giant Aramco reports $26.9 billion profit in third quarter, beating expectations
item.description: The oil giant’s figures slightly beat analysts’ projections. Saudi oil giant Aramco reported Tuesday a $26.9 billion profit in the third quarter, down slightly from last year as global energy prices remain depressed over concerns of too much oil being on the market.Aramco’s results serve as a bellwether for the wider oil industry, which is still digesting the OPEC+ decision this weekend to halt planned production increases in the first quarter of next year over supply worries. Benchmark Brent crude, at just under $65 a barrel, has been fluttering near a four-year low.In filing on Riyadh’s Tada...

item.title: T-Mobile Black Friday deals 2025: when they start, plus what to expect
item.description: Looking to upgrade your phone or internet? Here's exactly what you should expect with the upcoming Black Friday deals at T-Mobile.

item.title: Meta’s Ray-Ban Display Have an App Problem
item.description: The problem is there just aren't any.

item.title: Le MacBook à prix riquiqui pourrait sortir avant l’été prochain
item.description: Cette rumeur d'un MacBook très abordable qui traine depuis quelques mois est particulièrement rafraîchissante, Apple nous ayant habitué à des produits toujours plus chers. L'indiscrétion prend un peu plus de muscle aujourd'hui.

item.title: What’s changed the most for strategy in the past 44 years
item.description: And what that means for your business. When I think about the changes in the context for strategy across my career, my view contrasts starkly with the consensus view. Most obsess about rising VUCA (the combination of volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity) as the key change. I don’t—and I explain my position in this Playing to Win/Practitioner Insights (PTW/PI) called What has Changed the Most for Strategy: Implications for Your Strategy. And as always, you can find all the previous PTW/PI here....

item.description: The investor successfully predicted the 2008 housing market crash

item.title: Apple is reportedly working on a cheaper Mac laptop with an iPhone chip
item.description: Apple is working on a low-cost Mac laptop powered by an iPhone chip that it plans to launch in the first half of 2026, according to Bloomberg. The laptop will also have a “a lower-end LCD display” and a screen size that’s “slightly below” the 13.6-inch screen on the current MacBook Air. The laptop will […]

item.description: ChatGPT Go is free for a year in India – here’s why this could matter to U.S. users.

item.title: À seulement 119 €, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 4G est la solution pas chère pour changer de smartphone lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Un smartphone simple, endurant et bien fichu pour ceux qui n’ont pas besoin de la 5G. Le Xiaomi Redmi 14 joue la carte de la simplicité, et pour ce Black Month, il devient encore plus abordable, affiché à 119 euros au lieu de 203 euros sur Amazon.
